Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Extends the authorization for the county of Seneca to impose an additional one percent sales and compensating use tax
Summary: Extends the expiration of the authorization for the county of Seneca to impose an additional one percent sales and compensating use tax for two years.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to extending the expiration of the authorization for the county of Seneca to impose an additional one percent sales and compensating use tax
